sentences.english: Iliopsoas tendinitis is a common injury in sport.
sentences.chinese: 髂腰肌肌腱炎是一種常見的運動損傷。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To evaluate the effects of sodium hyaluronate on adhesion prevention after flexor tendon surgery.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價透明質酸鈉預防術後屈肌腱粘連的臨牀效果。

sentences.english: Moment arms of the flexor carpi radialis tendon showed a consistent increase during wrist motion. Conclusion?
sentences.chinese: 橈側腕屈肌腱在腕屈伸或尺橈偏時均顯著增大。

sentences.english: You’ll most likely feel pain as inflamed tendons, muscles or joints pinch on nerves.
sentences.chinese: 當肌腱發炎，肌肉或關節壓迫神經時你會感到疼痛。

sentences.english: Right-back Jerez also has problems with his thigh after recovering from tendon inflammation.
sentences.chinese: 右後衛赫雷斯在肌腱發炎恢復後，大腿仍有一些問題。

sentences.english: Conclusions Fixation method of finger position play an impotant role in functional restoration of the hand after tendon repair.
sentences.chinese: 結論指位固定法有利於鞘管區肌腱修復後功能的恢復。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the value of MR imaging in diagnosing the injury of the tendon of tibialis posterior muscle.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價磁共振在脛後肌腱損傷中的應用價值。

sentences.english: Building muscle strength also strengthens the tendons of these muscles.
sentences.chinese: 肌肉力量加強的同時，肌腱也同樣得到了增強。

sentences.english: Objective To conclude the method and experience of reconstruction of Achilles tendon rupture with peroneus longus tendon transfer.
sentences.chinese: 目的腓骨長肌腱轉移修復跟腱斷裂的手術和經驗。

sentences.english: Prayer is the slender sinew that moves the muscle of omnipotence.
sentences.chinese: 禱告是細長的肌腱可以牽動無所不能者的肌肉。

sentences.english: The dissection level was on the surface of the flexor and extensor tendons.
sentences.chinese: 皮瓣遊離平面位於趾伸屈肌腱表面。

sentences.english: Objective To provide anatomical basis for free transplantion of palmaris longus(PL) with peritendon tissues.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲帶腱周組織掌長肌腱遊離移植提供解剖學基礎。

sentences.english: Money is the sinew of love and of war.
sentences.chinese: 金錢是戰爭地戀愛和肌腱。

sentences.english: Replace the tendons, repair the tendon sheaths and retinacula, and close the incision.
sentences.chinese: 將肌腱回覆原位，修補腱鞘及支持帶，然後關閉切口。

sentences.english: They're held together with tendons and ligaments.
sentences.chinese: 肌腱和韌帶把它們連在一起。

sentences.english: The refreshment after the operation that the tendon of ring finger and forefinger ruptures problem?
sentences.chinese: 無名指和食指的肌腱斷裂的手術後的恢復問題？

definition: articular capsule (of joint such as knee in anatomy)
